rule.condition: same(pir.review in $L.file.save, NULL) and not (same(pir.review in $L.file, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( pir.review in SavedRecord = NULL AND pir.review in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Review Results">pir.review</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Review Results">pir.review</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send Notification: "CHM PIR" (when ( pir.review in SavedRecord = NULL AND pir.review in CurrentRecord != NULL))
